Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 5 Ganthagocchaka » 5.1 Ganthaduka » 5.1.7 Pañhāvāra » 5.1.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 5.1.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
37.
1701Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
1702Anulomaṃ.
<< 5.1.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
